ValidationRule.description: Only Enterprise Onboarding team can change the Stage field to Close.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name = "Customer Onboarding", ISCHANGED(Stage__c), ISPICKVAL((Stage__c),"Closed"), $Profile.Name <> "Enterprise Onboarding", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Stage of the DSR to close for Customer Onboarding.
